channel.title: Shortcut List
channel.description: ALT + B : BOOKMARKS TAB ALT + D : EDIT ADDRESS ALT + E : EDIT TAB ALT + F : FILE TAB ALT + H : HELP TAB ALT + I : HISTORY TAB ALT + V : VIEW TAB ALT + W : WINDOW TAB ALT + F4 : CLOSE WINDOW CTRL + A : SELECT ALL CTRL + B : DELETE SELECTED CTRL + C : COPY CTRL + D : BOOKMARK PAGE CTRL + F : FIND CTRL + L : EDIT ADDRESS CTRL + M : MINIMIZE WINDOW CTRL + N : NEW WINDOW CTRL + O : OPEN FILE CTRL + P : PRINT CTRL + Q : CLOSE WINDOW CTRL + R : RELOAD PAGE CTRL + S : SAVE CTRL + T : NEW TAB CTRL + U : VIEW SOURCE CTRL + V : PASTE (WORKS WITH COPY AND CUT) CTRL + W : CLOSE WINDOW CTRL + X : CUT (DELETE THEN COPIES ONCE, SUCH AS MOVING IT TO ANOTHER AREA) CTRL + Z : UNDO CTRL + ALT + A : ACTIVITY CTRL + ALT + B : BOOKMARKS CTRL + ALT + E : EMPTY CACHE CTRL + ALT + L : DOWNLOADS CTRL + ALT + U : VIEW SOURCE

item.title: Shortcut List
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

CTRL + Enter.

Add’s www. and .com to something. So
Say I just typed motocross. And then pressed CTRL + Enter…
It would come out www.motocross.com…
Mega haxage?

Read full topic

item.title: Shortcut List
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

ALT + B : BOOKMARKS TAB
ALT + D : EDIT ADDRESS
ALT + E : EDIT TAB
ALT + F : FILE TAB
ALT + H : HELP TAB
ALT + I : HISTORY TAB
ALT + V : VIEW TAB
ALT + W : WINDOW TAB
ALT + F4 : CLOSE WINDOW
CTRL + A : SELECT ALL
CTRL + B : DELETE SELECTED
CTRL + C : COPY
CTRL + D : BOOKMARK PAGE
CTRL + F : FIND
CTRL + L : EDIT ADDRESS
CTRL + M : MINIMIZE WINDOW
CTRL + N : NEW WINDOW
CTRL + O : OPEN FILE
CTRL + P : PRINT
CTRL + Q : CLOSE WINDOW
CTRL + R : RELOAD PAGE
CTRL + S : SAVE
CTRL + T : NEW TAB
CTRL + U : VIEW SOURCE
CTRL + V : PASTE (WORKS WITH COPY AND CUT)
CTRL + W : CLOSE WINDOW
CTRL + X : CUT (DELETE THEN COPIES ONCE, SUCH AS MOVING IT TO ANOTHER AREA)
CTRL + Z : UNDO
CTRL + ALT + A : ACTIVITY
CTRL + ALT + B : BOOKMARKS
CTRL + ALT + E : EMPTY CACHE
CTRL + ALT + L : DOWNLOADS
CTRL + ALT + U : VIEW SOURCE

Read full topic
